Title: Worth purchasing
Comment: I always purchased bata shoes they are comfortable cool and affordable. These deals in that price with that comfortable are amazing.

Title: Shoe
Comment: Ive been wearing Bata footwear for years, and they never cease to amaze me with their balance of comfort and durability. Whether its their formal collection or casual slip-ons, the build quality is solid enough to handle daily wear without falling apart. What I appreciate most is that they offer stylish designs without the 'designer' price tag. If you need reliable shoes that won't break the bank, Bata is always a safe bet.

Title: Waste of money
Comment:
I purchased a black girls school shoe(size 3) from the Bata Mogappair East branch(opposite Spartan School) on 06 March 2025 for â‚¹;598.

As soon as I brought the shoe home, I noticed that the inner sole was coming off. I immediately went back to the store and requested an exchange, which they did.

However, within one month, the inner sponge started coming out and tearing from inside. Actually used the shoe for 7 months( that even with inside damages) The shoe became completely unusable now.

(Please note: April & May(2 months), schools were closed for summer vacation & Saturdays & Sundays are non-working days)

This means the shoe was actually used for less than 7 months with bad inner condition. Now outer parts also torn fully & can't wear them anymore.

Now, the condition of the shoe is very poor:

#One shoe is torn from the side and back

# Inner sponge is coming out

#Threads have come off

My child cannot wear it anymore

** I have uploaded photos as proof of the condition.

Finally, I had to buy a new pair from the Paragon brand, which costs almost half the price of the Bata shoe, yet the quality is much better.

This experience is very disappointing, especially from a brand like Bata, which is expected to provide durable school footwear.

Title: A GOOD TO BUY SHOE
Comment:
Purchased a pair of Bata shoes a few months ago for daily use, mainly for walking and regular outdoor work. Bata is a well-known brand in India, so I expected decent quality and comfort, and overall my experience has been satisfactory.

The first thing I liked about these shoes is the comfort. The sole is soft and provides good grip, which makes walking easy even for long hours. The fitting is proper, and the shoes did not cause any foot pain even after wearing them for the whole day. The material quality also feels strong and suitable for Indian weather conditions.

Another good point is durability. I have been using these shoes regularly, and there is no major wear and tear till now. They are easy to clean and still look good after regular use. The design is simple and suitable for office as well as casual wear.

Title: Shoe
Comment:
Very good. And light weight

generally considered a good value for everyday wear, offering affordable fashion with decent comfort, lightweight options, and good cushioning in some lines (like running shoes), but quality and durability are inconsistent; some find them long-lasting and soft (especially leather ones), while others report issues with material (hard leather, synthetic), sole breaking, and inconsistent sizing, making them a hit-or-miss depending on the specific model and user expectations for price

Title: Urgent: Incorrect and Unacceptable Product Deliver
Comment:
Dear Team,

I am extremely disappointed and shocked by the delivery I have just received from BATA. Instead of the sandals I ordered, I have been sent a completely different product and one that is clearly dirty and appears to be an old or used pair. This is entirely unacceptable from a brand of BATAs standing.

As a long-standing and loyal customer, I would like to bring to your attention that BATAs service standards have declined considerably over the past several months. With physical stores often poorly stocked and staff inadequately informed, customers like me are compelled to rely on online purchases, only to be met with experiences such as this.

To be very clear, I do not wish to receive a refund, as that would be the easiest resolution. I expect an immediate replacement of the exact same new pair of sandals originally ordered, delivered within the next 12 days, without any further inconvenience to me.

For your reference and verification, photographs of the product delivered are attached with this email.

I trust that this grievance will be taken seriously and resolved promptly to my complete satisfaction. I look forward to your immediate response and confirmation of the replacement dispatch.

Thank you.

Regards

Title: Bata Footwear: A Comprehensive Review
Comment:
Bata, a name synonymous with footwear in India, has been a staple in many households for decades. Known for its wide range of shoes catering to various age groups and occasions, Bata has built a reputation for affordability and accessibility. However, like any brand, it has its strengths and areas where it could improve. This review delves into the various aspects of Bata footwear, providing a balanced perspective to help potential buyers make informed decisions.

Product Range and Design

Bata offers a diverse collection of footwear, including formal shoes, casual wear, sports shoes, and sandals. Their designs range from classic styles to contemporary trends, ensuring there's something for everyone. The brand frequently updates its collections to stay in line with fashion trends, making it a go-to choice for many.

Pros:

Variety: A wide range of styles suitable for different occasions.

Affordability: Competitive pricing makes it accessible to a broad audience.

Availability: Widely available both online and in physical stores across India.

Cons:

Design Limitations: While there is variety, some designs may not appeal to fashion-forward individuals.

Quality Variations: The quality can vary across different product lines, with some items being more durable than others.

Comfort and Fit

Comfort is a crucial factor when choosing footwear, and Bata generally delivers in this aspect. Many customers report that their shoes are comfortable for daily wear and provide adequate support.

Pros:

Comfortable Insoles: Many models feature cushioned insoles that enhance comfort.

Wide Fit Options: Availability of various sizes and widths caters to different foot shapes.

Breathable Materials: Use of breathable materials in many designs helps in reducing foot odor and discomfort.

Cons:

Break-In Period: Some models may require a short break-in period to achieve optimal comfort.

Limited Arch Support: Certain designs may lack sufficient arch support, which could be a concern for individuals with specific foot needs.

Durability and Quality

Durability is an area where Bata has received mixed reviews. While some customers praise the longevity of their shoes, others have reported issues with wear and tear.

Pros:

Sturdy Construction: Many models are built with durable materials that withstand regular use.

Maintenance: Some shoes are easy to clean and maintain, extending their lifespan.

Cons:

Sole Durability: Some users have reported that the soles wear out faster than expected.

Material Quality: Occasional inconsistencies in material quality can affect the overall durability of certain models.

Customer Service and Shopping Experience

Bata's customer service has been a topic of discussion among consumers. While many have had positive experiences, there are reports of dissatisfaction regarding product issues and return processes.

Pros:

Wide Retail Network: Extensive presence of physical stores across India makes shopping convenient.

Online Shopping: User-friendly online platform with home delivery options.

Cons:

Customer Support: Some customers have reported delays in response and resolution of issues.

Return Policy: Instances of challenges in returning or exchanging products have been noted.

Pricing and Value for Money

Bata's pricing strategy positions it as an affordable option for quality footwear. The brand offers a range of products that cater to different budget segments.

Pros:

Competitive Pricing: Offers value for money, especially for everyday wear.

Frequent Discounts: Regular sales and discounts make products more accessible.

Cons:

Premium Segment: Limited options in the premium segment may not cater to all preferences.

Price Variations: Some customers feel that certain products are priced higher than their perceived value.

Conclusion

Bata continues to be a reliable choice for many when it comes to footwear. Its wide range of products, comfort, and affordability make it a brand worth considering. However, potential buyers should be aware of the varying quality across different product lines and the mixed reviews regarding customer service. As with any purchase, it's advisable to try on shoes and assess their comfort and fit before buying.

In summary, Bata offers a blend of tradition and modernity in its footwear collections, making it a brand that caters to a diverse audience. While there are areas for improvement, particularly in customer service and product consistency, Bata remains a significant player in the Indian footwear market.

Title: Best shoes for runners
Comment: I have been using Bata running shoes for the last six months and found them perfect for daily running and jogging. The shoes offer excellent cushioning, good grip, and are lightweight, which helps in long-distance running. The sole is durable and flexible, allowing smooth movement on both roads and tracks. The breathable material keeps feet sweat-free, and the overall comfort is impressive for this price range. I recommend Bata running shoes to all beginners and regular runners looking for affordable quality.

Title: Quality Has Dropped
Comment:
Bata used to be my go-to brand for reliable shoes, but my recent experience was really disappointing. I bought a pair of formal shoes, and within just a few weeks of normal use, the sole started to peel and the stitching came loose.

The comfort level wasnâ€™t great eitherâ€”hard sole and not ideal for long wear. I expected better durability, especially from a brand like Bata thatâ€™s known for quality.

Also, when I reached out to the store for a replacement, the service was slow and unhelpful. Unfortunately, it doesnâ€™t feel like the same trusted brand anymore.
